original_text: The officers in Zoan are fools. The officers in Memphis have confused each other. The leaders of Egypt's clans have led their people in the wrong direction.
korean_text: 소안의 방백들은 어리석었고 놉의 방백들은 미혹되었도다 그들은 애굽 종족들의 모퉁잇돌이거늘 애굽을 그릇 가게 하였도다

sentences.original_text: The officers in Zoan are fools.
The officers in Memphis have confused each other.
have led their people in the wrong direction.
